subject: Street Sense (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: In a half-dozen powerful strides, Street Sense demonstrated the grit that made him the 2-year-old champion and now the winner of 6 races in 11 starts.
snippet: In a half-dozen powerful strides, Street Sense demonstrated the grit that made him the 2-year-old champion and now the winner of 6 races in 11 starts.
